entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Edson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:04 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -26.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edson Airport 08:12 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -26.3°C
Pressure: 103.4 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -28.8°C
Wind: ENE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
